mapper.select: SELECT t.table_name, obj_description(t.table_name::regclass) table_comment, c.column_name, col_description(t.table_name::regclass, c.ordinal_position) column_comment, c.data_type, c.is_nullable, c.character_maximum_length FROM information_schema.tables t right join information_schema.columns c on t.table_catalog = c.table_catalog and t.table_name = c.table_name WHERE t.table_catalog = #{database} AND t.table_name = #{table} ORDER BY c.ordinal_position;
